name: Nobody Knows - Spooktober Jam
description:
*If you play this game in browser, please play it in fullscreen, this is my first WebGL game and i found out, that the game is not scaling with screen size. Thank you :)*

Game, where you play as a ghost, that has to steal all candies.

I made this game for my first game jam.

Please rate my game :)

If something is not working, tell me in comments. And try pressing F5.
